name: Sir Isaac Newton
msg: "His lectures are a force to be reckoned with—literally. Gravity finally makes sense!"

name: Albert Einstein
msg: "Explains the universe with elegance and simplicity. E=mc² made easy."

name: Marie Curie
msg: "Her passion for science is radioactive. Inspires generations of researchers."

name: Charles Darwin
msg: "Teaches natural selection like no other. Life's diversity explained."

name: Nikola Tesla
msg: "Invents the future in every lecture. AC power made simple."

name: Ada Lovelace
msg: "The first computer programmer. Her algorithms are timeless."

name: Alan Turing
msg: "Decodes the future of computing. His legacy is the foundation of modern tech."

name: Carl Jung
msg: "Unlocks the unconscious like a pro. Shadow work has never been more enlightening."

name: Richard Feynman
msg: "Explains the universe with jokes and diagrams. Makes quantum physics fun!"

name: Grace Hopper
msg: "She invented debugging—and still squashes bugs faster than anyone."

name: Aristotle
msg: "Defines wisdom in every lecture. Timeless thinking, modern relevance."

name: Hypatia of Alexandria
msg: "A pioneer of reason and numbers. Her presence is powerful and precise."

name: Pythagoras
msg: "Squares things up nicely. His theorems still hold class together!"

name: Emily Dickinson
msg: "Teaches literature like an emotion. Her classes are quiet but profound."

name: René Descartes
msg: "Makes you think you think, therefore you pass. Deep, but logical."

name: Galileo Ferraris
msg: "His lectures rotate your understanding of motors. AC genius!"

name: Prof. Richard Feynman
msg: "Explains the universe with jokes and diagrams. Makes quantum physics fun!"

name: Dr. Grace Hopper
msg: "She invented debugging—and still squashes bugs faster than anyone."

name: Prof. Rachel Carson
msg: "Makes you love nature—and fight for it. Powerful voice for the planet."

name: Dr. Neil deGrasse Tyson
msg: "Engaging and cosmic. You'll laugh, learn, and stare into space."

name: Prof. Elon Musk
msg: "Always 10 years ahead. Sparks wild ideas and bold ambition."

name: Dr. Virginia Woolf
msg: "Stream of consciousness that flows with beauty and depth."

name: Prof. Socrates
msg: "Answers every question with a question. Learn by doubt, grow by reason."

name: Dr. Noam Chomsky
msg: "Language will never sound the same. Revolutionary insights every lecture."

name: Prof. Simone de Beauvoir
msg: "Empowers minds and dismantles norms. Thought‑provoking and bold."

name: Dr. Alan Watts
msg: "His words flow like rivers of wisdom. Deeply relaxing yet awakening."

name: Prof. Buckminster Fuller
msg: "Teaches design with purpose. His ideas are structurally genius."

name: Dr. Barbara McClintock
msg: "Jumps into genes like a pro. Her lectures are Nobel‑level clarity."

name: Prof. Isaac Asimov
msg: "Where science meets imagination. Makes futures feel present."
